description: PodsMetricSource indicates how to scale on a metric describing each pod in the current scale target (for example, transactions-processed-per-second). The values will be averaged together before being compared to the target value.

metricName.description: metricName is the name of the metric in question

targetAverageValue.description: targetAverageValue is the target value of the average of the metric across all relevant pods (as a quantity)
